name: Blue Tank Adventures 2
description:
BTA2 is a little project made in a week, you control a tank fighting against aliens. No HP or continues for the tank, as long as you have speed you can survive!

  • WASD / ZQSD to move
  • Target with the mouse
  • Left-Click to shoot

Art was made by @Weelqa, code by me, music is a CC0 I forgot where I got it from.
